Plot: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.
Title: Thirst
Writer: Seo-Gyeong Jeong (screenplay), Chan-wook Park (screenplay), Émile Zola (inspired by the book "Thérèse Raquin")
Actors: Kang-ho Song, Ok-bin Kim, Hae-suk Kim, Ha-kyun Shin
tomatoConsensus: The stylish Thirst packs plenty of bloody thrills to satisfy fans of both vampire films and director Chan Wook Park.
